Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: courtneyb
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone last week and it came a day before the estimated arrival day! I really enjoy this phone no problems and i really encourage you to buy from this seller! The only thing is that you should buy screen protectors because it does not come with the phone. Over all very very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Do some shopping first...
Reviews.Author: Sand Man
Reviews.Content: I discovered years ago that some Marketplace vendors show the same degree of commitment to the authenticity of their wares as that of the average used car salesman. That of course, does not apply to any of the products that Amazon takes under its wing and sells with Amazon blessings. Some vendors are in fact very concerned about providing their products as advertised, but I have to question why somebody would trust a high risk item such as a used Smartphone being listed here without first shopping around for the same phone that has 4G  LTE, brand new, at a comparable price, and is completely guaranteed. There are better deals to be found so I highly recommend that you check out the availability of this T-Mobile prepaid phone elsewhere, especially if your locale happens to have T-Mobile's 4G services available.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: nat13
Reviews.Content: First, The phone came before the estimated time of arrival, wonderful!  I normally don't like buying refurbished or used phones but I was in need of a new phone and the price was too good to resist.  The phone came in its original box and upon opening it the phone was fully intact, all stickers on the screen and back door, brand new!  Usb, charger and headphones included!  Unfortunately, The battery seems to not charge all the way to 100% but I just got it so I'm working on that and I hope I can get that fixed....Also, It says tmobile and I have tmobile unfortunately  my SIM card was too big to fit so I had to cut it down to fit...i guess tmobile sim chips range in size....I'm just hoping I'm able to fix the battery life(battery life is important since I use my phone for everything, that's why I gave it 3 stars)..other than that the phone works and looks good....bought refurbished from Apex Trading....

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Zaid AL waznee
Reviews.Content: phon works just fine with t mobile .4 g speed Iike that phone.I would recomment it .the speed and screen everything nice

Reviews.Title: Not really an LTE phone so the T999L is really a T999 without the "L"
Reviews.Author: thereaintnoaudiophiles
Reviews.Content: Not really an LTE phone so the T999L is really a T999 without the "L", which was disappointing because I thought I was getting an LTE device.

Reviews.Title: fraud, theft
Reviews.Author: Yerdys José Escalona
Reviews.Content: I sold a cell reprogrammed with software sgh-T999 when in reality is a cell sgh-i747 which is much cheaper. No holds or is legal actalizacion tmobile. The feature of the phone shows me as already scheduled a second time and tells me it's been modified, no upgrade takes. And I came with android version 4.1.2, care. In spanish: compre este telefono porque pense que era un t999 pero en realidad es un i747, fue reprogramado dos veces por lo cual su estado es modificado y no me toma mas actualizacion me muestra error. Solo me llego hasta la version android 4.1.2.  El i747 es mucho mas barato. Amazon deberia tomar acciones legales contra esta gente. Fraude.

Reviews.Title: S3 good for money
Reviews.Author: Jeffery Orn "Moab King"
Reviews.Content: Screen is bright and clear, battery last about a day (could be better). Don't care for the built in apps from T-Mobile, but had no choice in the matter.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Ellis
Reviews.Content: Needed a new phone ASAP because my old one was "crapping out."  It is always difficult to drop close to $500 on a cell phone, but this one seems to be worth the money.

Reviews.Title: robust smartphone
Reviews.Author: B. Smith "library lady"
Reviews.Content: I know the S IV is out now but very happy with the S III.  Has so many features and ease of use.  So far, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: nice fone
Reviews.Author: Hector
Reviews.Content: i love this fone it does what i want it to do thank you for having this fone available thanks once again

Reviews.Title: poor power performance
Reviews.Author: Meanmike
Reviews.Content: phone had problems from day one. If a sd card was installed, battery life would drop to less than 24 hours (with no phone, data or texting). even after doing a factory reset, i could not get more than 1 day battery life (without activity). tried different brands and sizes of sd cards with no success. sent phone back for refund after 2 weeks of hell. looking at samsung user forums, i was not alone. the galaxy s3 and jellybean o.s. did not work very well for a lot of people.

Reviews.Title: A Real lemon
Reviews.Author: Anthony A. Mcintyre "Tony Mac"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, the charging unit did not work.I ordered an "unlocked" phone and got one that was locked.  Had to take it to a shop to get it unlocked.  To their credit, Amazon paid for that.Phone dropped calls regularly, shut off and restarted on its' own, the screen would freeze and I would have to remove the battery to restart.  NEVER once got 4G speed.  Internet was as slow as my old $63 AT&T; phone and I paid $484 for this one.Sent it back, and bought the same model phone from the shop that unlocked the first one, for $104 less.  Have had the replacement over a week, with absolutely no problems and nothing but 4G all the time.  The internet is almost as fast as my computer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone.....
Reviews.Author: maribel franco
Reviews.Content: great phone..love it...great condition...no issues...the phone is delivering as promised except the TMOBILE service sucks I miss US Cellular but too expensive...

Reviews.Title: I liked it
Reviews.Author: yefri
Reviews.Content: Excellent it was a little late they said something and the package was here not the date they said  so!

Reviews.Title: works awesome
Reviews.Author: Robert Guerra
Reviews.Content: Works great, size is perfect couldn't ask for anything better. Works with all the other accessories I need and use everyday.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: meg
Reviews.Content: The quality was great I got what I paid for, and I'm extremley happy with it. No problems at all

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE  AND FAST DELIVERY
Reviews.Author: KIMBERLYSTR
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT. SO FAR NO PROBLEMS . EVEN TOOK IT TO THE TMOBILE STORE  TO VERIFY THE AUTHENTICITY OF THE PHONE. EVERYTHING WAS LEGAL  AND LEGITIMATE .

Reviews.Title: not so happy
Reviews.Author: kesh_88
Reviews.Content: Came on time but no headphones and no phone.case as advertised I am not satisfied customer with this product phone had scratches on it

Reviews.Title: refurbished !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: oswaldo nieves
Reviews.Content: I sent the computer with an aftermarket battery samsung and also get me without headphones and the package was not properly protected for shipping, but I care more what missing the original samsung battery and headphones.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: only draw back is battery life. Otherwise a great phone I would recommend if battery life is not a big deal to you. I basicly need to charge it every day to every 2 days depending on use.

Reviews.Title: phone awesome
Reviews.Author: stephen ramsey
Reviews.Content: Samsung galaxy 3 phone is awesome, you have converted a die hard apple phone user,I can,t say enough!!!!! Thanx

Reviews.Title: instead of new phone I got a refurbished phone with no warranty
Reviews.Author: john veliadis
Reviews.Content: I purchased and paid for a new phone. Instead I received a phone that was in a box that stated there was no warranty and that the phone can be used or refurbished but in operational condition. To return it, one had to call the seller within 15 days to get a return number (otherwise you are stuck with the phone) and of course the seller's phone was constantly busy. I contacted Amazon that stood by me and made sure the seller was contacted and received the returned phone. I purchased a new phone later elsewhere and so I can compare what the seller had sent me to a new phone. The "new phone" this seller had sent was not in an original box, had no manual, no earphones, and no warranty. And of course it said it could be refurbished. The positive thing I learned is that Amazon stands by you and will help you sort things through. So I have full faith in amazon tat saw this through.

Reviews.Title: Much more than I dared hope...
Reviews.Author: buy-bye
Reviews.Content: This is a shout out to Driven Wireless! Thanks so much for providing a wonderful phone. This is my first smart phone. It is fairly intuitive and can handle an amazing array of tasks beautifully and FAST. LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Met My Expectations
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: There are things that I was looking for that this galaxy didn't have . Example , if your on the Internet & you scroll down far you'd like to get to the top quickly , you have to scroll manually . Just certain little bits here and there. But overall a excellent phone . The phone runs smooth & apps don't crash as much as the iPhone apps. Although there is more of a variety of apps in the App Store versus , google play !

Reviews.Title: it came on time
Reviews.Author: Sibo
Reviews.Content: the phone turns off randomly and will not turn back on right away and also it won't go to keyboard mode but its all good.

Reviews.Title: like the white is cool and cooler
Reviews.Author: trandal
Reviews.Content: Llike the white is cool and cooler.and like bigger screen mostly to text keyboardyet its a one hand operation

Reviews.Title: Working flawlessly!
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: So far the phone is performing as it should, great battery life and really good performance as expected. The only thing that I really didn't like was the fact that the wire of headphones was a little bit bent, almost damaged and it looks used but they work as they should so no biggie about it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I know the new S4 is out, but this is still the best phone out there. The diversity of this phone is amazing.

Reviews.Title: my first smart phone
Reviews.Author: Yuccasue
Reviews.Content: Doesn't come with much of an instruction book, but we found one online (500+ pages). Even if you are an experienced user, you'll need it, because there are SO MANY features you can customize.Design is sleek and light. Fits in a purse pocket well. Downside to the design: holding it in one hand, you tend to hit the volume AND the on/off button at the same time (surprise!). You'll learn to hold it so that doesn't happen.I bought the SIM card at Walmart to get the cheap/simple data plan from TMobile. That could have gone better, but if you know what you want, you can get it, eventually. I am weeding out the pre-loaded stuff that I will never use.This phone is loaded with features and I am using more each day:  auto-rotate for sideways display,  auto-brightness for the screen (I live in the very bright desert.),  Bluetooth to the car (it whistles every time they meet),  getting my email online (had to scale that back-too much info, but there's a setting for that, of course),  two cameras (the one facing you turns off the keypad when you actually use it as a phone, so you don't face-dial),  voice input (easier than typing on that necessarily tiny keyboard, plus it makes me look cool).I was worried about paying for features I won't use, but I keep finding things that are useful even as I discard or disable others. I am pleased with this phone and look forward to figuring out even more features.

Reviews.Title: hi
Reviews.Author: muhidin a ahemed
Reviews.Content: i trust amazon online market this cellphone blokced cellphone i can not use and i have traveling option i need immeditly return this item

Reviews.Title: all should know already
Reviews.Author: Maria Clotilde
Reviews.Content: not to much to say after tons of reviews out there about this phone. Came in perfect condition, all accessories included, and works fine. No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: "Software Update" unavaible
Reviews.Author: mike1899 "mike1899"
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone, but I am very dissatisfied with seller (thus the 1 star.) Device has Android 4.1.1 installed (4.2.2 and 4.3 are already out) and wanted to update the system software. When I go into Settings/About Device/Software Update I get the error message "Your device has been modified. Software updates are not available." If that is the price of buying an unlocked phone, then the seller should have made that clear in the product description. Lastly, advertised is the model "SGH-T999L", but per my phone settings the model is "SGH-T999". The "L" model is LTE capable, and therefore the one I received is not.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S III S3 T999 Unlocked 3G 850/1700/1900/2100; 700/1700 (T-Mobile 4G ), Marble White US Version with Full Warranty
